title: 2.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a program that uses the turtle module and draws a staircase using squares. Use nested loops (one to draw squares, another to increase the number of squares, and the other to increase the rows).

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
